page.title: 03LIFE IN TREMEIRCHION SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Tremeirchion V.P. school.AT present there are fifty one pupils in the school.The top class have their lessons in the mobile which stands on the edge of our school.The school was built in 1865.Its staff consists of one headmaster,one fultime and one partime teacher,one cook,one partime helper one cartaker and one nursery assistant.The school year is three terms.After coming back after the summer break we start practising for the harvest festival and make a service for it.We think up our Christmas concert as well as having a Christmas party which has a Santa aswell as a disco.At the beginning we have a Christmas fair to raise money to pay for our computer and our stereo music centre.At the beginning of spring we go to a pantomime at theatre Clwyd.
